measured_by: 7-point self-report rating of how much the participant generally likes the food
justification: "Second, on their general cached values: 'In general, how much do you like eating this food (ignoring the current doctor restrictions)?', reported on a similar scale … where 1 was … and 7 was 'this food is among my favorite dishes'."

measured_by: 7-point self-report rating of how good the food would be in the given situation
justification: "First, on their context-specific values: 'In this situation, how good it would be to make this food (given the current doctor restrictions)?', reported on a scale ranging from 1 … to 7 …"

measured_by: 7-point self-report rating of how often the participant eats the food
justification: "…we asked them: 'How often do you eat each of these foods, compared to all the types of food you eat?', reported again on a scale from 1-7, where 1 was 'this food is among the least common dishes I eat' … and 7 was 'this food is among the most common dishes I eat'."

measured_by: retrospective self-report listing of all options that came to mind (up to 8 items)
justification: "…we asked them to retrospectively record all the options that came to mind, allowing them to list up to 8. Importantly, we emphasized that they should list any options that came to mind, even if those options were quickly rejected."
